original_text: When they had appointed a day for him, they came to him at his lodging in greater numbers. From morning till evening he expounded to them, testifying to the kingdom of God and trying to convince them about Jesus both from the Law of Moses and from the Prophets.
korean_text: 그들이 날짜를 정하고 그가 유숙하는 집에 많이 오니 바울이 아침부터 저녁까지 강론하여 하나님의 나라를 증언하고 모세의 율법과 선지자의 말을 가지고 예수에 대하여 권하더라

sentences.original_text: When they had appointed a day for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 위해 날짜를 정했을 때

sentences.original_text: they came to him at his lodging
testifying to the kingdom of God
and trying to convince them about Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예수에 대해 그들을 설득하려고 노력했습니다

sentences.original_text: both from the Law of Moses
